title: Drones
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Killed by drones
My mother, my father
My sister and my brother
My son and my daughter
[Verse 2]
Killed by drones
Our lives between your fingers and your thumb
Can you feel anything at all?
 
Are you dead inside?
Now you can kill from the safety of your home with drones
[Outro]
Amen
